name: WP Uninstaller by Azed
author: Azed - Cyril Chaniaud

sections.description:
You need to uninstall your wordpress site ?

But don’t want to do it manually ?

Need guidelines ?

  • It show you tables in your database starting with the prefixe setted in your wp-config
  • You can unsellect tables you don’t want to delete
  • You’ll need to confirm before it delete your wordpress

ONLY ADMINISTRATOR CAN USE IT !

  • Available in ENGLISH
  • Available in FRENCH
  • .PO available to make your own translation !
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-uninstaller-by-azed directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. It’s ready !
sections.faq:
Is this plugin easy tu use ?

Yes, we’ve made this plugin as simple as possible to allow any user to use it !

Which roles can use it ?

Only Administrator can use this plugin !
sections.changelog:
0.3

Adding control for deleting containing folder

0.1

This version is the first one ! It has been tested over 50 wordpress !

short_description: This plugin allow you to delete your wordpress installation safely.
